definition: to lift (sth heavy) using a crane or other mechanical means

to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group

sentences.english: Guo-rail crane is a kind of bridge cranes.
sentences.chinese: 過軌起重機是橋式起重機的一種。

sentences.english: Pipe beveling machine is used for lifting raw materials.
sentences.chinese: 管子坡口機是用於起重機械的原材料。

sentences.english: Construction cranes clutter the skylines of booming Chinese cities.
sentences.chinese: 繁榮城市的工地上起重機鬧哄哄。

sentences.english: I think my inspection is just some sort of formality.
sentences.chinese: 我要告訴我的客戶，當不走過場起重重量。

sentences.chinese: 介紹用PLC改造門座式起重機的繼電器控制電路。

definition: to construct by hoisting ready-built components into place
(a container) carried suspended or underslung/cable car bucket
